name: Support a Seattle High-earner Income Tax
description: Washington State has the most regressive tax structure in the United States. The city council of Seattle is trying to change that with 'A RESOLUTION expressing The City of Seattle’s intent to adopt a progressive income tax targeting high-income households.'

actions.name: Show up in support of the resolution

name: May Day March for Workers and Immigrant Rights
description: Washington State has the most regressive tax structure in the United States. The city council of Seattle is trying to change that with 'A RESOLUTION expressing The City of Seattle’s intent to adopt a progressive income tax targeting high-income households.'

actions.name: March with the ACLU
actions.description: The ACLU of Washington has endorsed the Annual May Day March for Workers and Immigrant Rights organized by the May 1st Action Coalition and El Comité and will be joining the march in solidarity with our local immigrant communities.

actions.name: Call your representatives in support of worker rights
actions.description: Defend workers’ rights by calling on Congress to oppose HB 1180 “Working Families Flexibility Act of 2017” which would amend the Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) to allow private-sector employers to “compensate” hourly workers with compensatory time off in lieu of overtime pay.
actions.sample_script: My name is [name] calling from [city,zip]. I want to let Representative [congressperson’s name] know that I will NOT support him/her in future elections if he/she votes to repeal the ACA. [insert personal story about ACA if able]

name: Oppose Obamacare (ACA) Repeal
description: Back and crueler than ever in order to get the 'Freedom Caucus' on board. If you have a preexisting condition you are being politely asked to die in the street basically.

actions.name: Call your representatives
actions.sample_script: My name is [name] calling from [city,zip]. I want to let Representative [congressperson’s name] know that I will NOT support him/her in future elections if he/she votes to repeal the ACA. [insert personal story about ACA if able]
